forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 12C. S winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 53F. S winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low near 10C. SW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Partial clearing late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 66F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
